tool_description: Creates and distributes volunteer position postings across multiple recruitment channels including job boards, social media, and community platforms.

position_title.description: The title of the volunteer position

position_description.description: Detailed description of volunteer responsibilities and impact

required_skills.description: List of required skills or qualifications

error_messages: Invalid deadline: Application deadline must be a future date in ISO 8601 format.
Empty required fields: Position title, organization name, and description cannot be empty.
Invalid channels: Supported channels are website, indeed, volunteermatch, facebook, linkedin, craigslist.
Skills list too long: Maximum 20 required skills allowed.
usage: Provide position details including title, organization, description, required skills, time commitment, location and deadline. Optionally specify posting channels. The tool will create optimized postings and distribute them.

posting_id.description: Unique identifier for the job posting

published_channels.description: List of channels where posting was successfully published

posting_urls.description: URLs where the posting can be viewed

estimated_reach.description: Estimated number of people who will see the posting
